desc: Dakine Cuisine is the creator of the world's most versatile condiments, including unique Agrodolce, Aioli and Golden Sriracha. In addition to artisan specialty food products, Dakine Cuisine operates Pies on Wheels, a wood-fired pizza truck servicing events in Upstate New York.

layout.text:
At Dakine Cuisine, our mission is to produce innovative specialty foods handcrafted with the highest quality and integrity.
Everything we make is small batch produced and bottled at our facility in Glens Falls, New York, using premium, all-natural ingredients. 
Work in the laboratory is never done as we strive to come up with unique and interesting products that people will love.
Check with us often for new products and flavors that you won’t want to cook... or drink... without!
